00001 package newtonERP.viewers.secondStep;
00002 
00003 import java.text.NumberFormat;
00004 
00010 public class MoneyViewer
00011 {
00012         private static NumberFormat numberFormat = NumberFormat
00013                         .getCurrencyInstance();
00014 
00019         public static String getHtmlCode(String inputValue)
00020         {
00021                 inputValue = inputValue.replace("$", "");
00022                 inputValue = inputValue.replace(',', '.');
00023                 inputValue = inputValue.trim();
00024 
00025                 if (inputValue.equals(""))
00026                         inputValue = "0.0";
00027 
00028                 double doubleNumber = Double.parseDouble(inputValue);
00029                 return getHtmlCode(doubleNumber);
00030         }
00031 
00036         public static String getHtmlCode(double inputValue)
00037         {
00038                 return numberFormat.format(inputValue).replace(" $", "$");
00039         }
00040 }
